name: I Expect You To Die
description: Play as a secret agent armed with telekinetic abilities on a mission to stop Zoraxis, a nefarious global weapons and pharmaceutical corporation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 916.29 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset
